alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 27 at 7:57AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZING DRIZZLE AND FOG WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN WELD AND NORTHEASTERN LARIMER COUNTIES... At 753 AM MDT, an area of freezing drizzle and fog was located from Wellington to the state border, and surrounding areas across northeast Larimer and northwest Weld Counties. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Nunn, Carr, Livermore, Rockport, Natural Fort, and Virginia Dale. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 278 and 297. US 287 north of Ted`s Place, and US 85 north of Nunn. Be prepared for slick travel conditions especially on bridges and overpasses. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
